author: Special Correspondent
text:
Cash stolen from IMFL retail outlet

A sum of Rs. 49,000 is reportedly stolen from a Tasmac-run IMFL retail outlet at Chekkanoorani on Friday night. The crime came to light on Saturday morning. Salesman M. Anbu Dharmalingam has lodged a complaint. Chekkanoorani police have registered a case of burglary.
title: TAMIL NADU
